revised_title: Investigating the Principle of Acidity and the Composition of Water in Relation to Phlogiston
tldr: The author conducts experiments to determine the composition of water and the role of phlogiston in chemical reactions. He finds that the acid produced from the reaction of dephlogisticated and inflammable air is not solely due to the presence of phlogisticated air, and that the acid is a necessary result of the union of these two types of air.
